response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This exceptional item is not just a product; it's a testament to quality and craftsmanship. Given its unique features and benefits, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. For this extraordinary piece, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $200. I trust this aligns with the value you place on such high-quality items. If you're interested, please let me know, and we can proceed with the transaction.", "product_price": 200}
